name: Solar System (itch) (ja-818)
description:
This Solar system simulator is a project for the Michigan State University specialization on Game design and development with Unity 2020.

In this project, I created a solar system simulator and added the following celestial bodies:

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Earth
    1. Moon
  4. Mars
  5. Asteroids

Created by Julián Arango
